name: Finite.instSigma
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : α → Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Finite α
inst✝ : ∀ (a : α), Finite (β a)
⊢ Finite (Sigma fun a => β a)
decl:
instance {β : α → Type*} [Finite α] [∀ a, Finite (β a)] : Finite (Σa, β a) := by
  letI := Fintype.ofFinite α
  letI := fun a => Fintype.ofFinite (β a)
  infer_instance

name: Finite.instPSigma
initialProofState:
ι : Sort u_2
π : ι → Sort u_3
inst✝¹ : Finite ι
inst✝ : ∀ (i : ι), Finite (π i)
⊢ Finite (PSigma fun i => π i)
decl:
instance {ι : Sort*} {π : ι → Sort*} [Finite ι] [∀ i, Finite (π i)] : Finite (Σ'i, π i) :=
  of_equiv _ (Equiv.psigmaEquivSigmaPLift π).symm
